SongName: I Took A Pill In Ibiza (SeeB Remix)
Album: I Took A Pill In Ibiza (SeeB Remix)
Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:01.08]I took a pill in Ibiza
[00:03.65]To show Avicii I was cool
[00:06.05]And when I finally got sober, felt 10 years older
[00:08.45]But fuck it, it was something to do
[00:10.66]I'm living out in LA
[00:12.42]
[00:12.92]I drive a sports car just to prove
[00:15.42]I'm a real big baller cause I made a million dollars
[00:17.76]And I spend it on girls and shoes
[00:19.89]But you don't wanna be high like me
[00:21.97]Never really knowing why like me
[00:24.47]You don't ever wanna step off that roller coaster and be all alone
[00:28.48]
[00:29.17]You don't wanna ride the bus like this
[00:31.69]Never knowing who to trust like this
[00:34.00]You don't wanna be stuck up on that stage singing
[00:37.15]
[00:37.56]Stuck up on that stage singing
[00:39.58]All I know are sad songs, sad songs
[00:48.66]Darling, all I know are sad songs, sad songs
[00:57.08]
[00:58.68]Hey woah..All I know are sad songs, woah sad songs ...
[01:36.66]I'm just a singer who already blew his shot
[01:40.66]I get along with old timers
[01:42.73]Cause my name's a reminder of a pop song people forgot
[01:45.78]And I can't keep a girl, no
[01:47.99]
[01:48.49]Cause as soon as the sun comes up
[01:50.75]I cut 'em all loose and work's my excuse
[01:53.44]But the truth is I can't open up
[01:55.13]But you don't wanna be high like me
[01:57.47]Never really knowing why like me
[01:59.66]You don't ever wanna step off that roller coaster and be all alone
[02:03.84]
[02:04.42]You don't wanna ride the bus like this
[02:07.12]Never knowing who to trust like this
[02:09.35]You don't wanna be stuck up on that stage singing
[02:12.80]Stuck up on that stage singing
[02:14.91]
[02:15.44]All I know are sad songs, sad songs
[02:23.81]Darling, all I know are sad songs, sad songs
[02:33.27]
[02:34.20]Hey woah..All I know are sad songs, woah sad songs ...
[03:19.31]
